name: Hospital Hooters
description:
"Nice and entertaining game" (Taleweaver)

"Fuegy, you're awsome." (A_Spec)

"Very nice game" (djslit)

"Good Tetris style game" (BADman)

A puzzle-game that combines elements from PuyoPuyo and Dr. Mario and features well developed nurses.

Features:
- Over 60 levels with over 10 different nurses (more will follow).
- Autoupdate to download new levels from within the game.
- A level-editor to design your own levels with your own nurses.
- "Endless" playmode for a quick hunt for hiscores.
- Local and worldwide hiscorelist.
- Slideshow feature, to view the nurses from the levels you completed.
- Each nurse wears unique underwear.
- Beautiful, handdrawn graphics.
- A moody soundtrack.
- Full frontal nudity when the cheatmode is enabled.
